info.title: Google Tasks
info.description: Bring Google Tasks content and metadata into your apps or websites.

parameters.name: tasklist
parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated user's default task list, use the special value @default.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of elements to return with this request. Default: maxResults=20. Maximum allowable value: maxResults=100.

parameters.name: completedMax
parameters.description: Upper bound for a task's completion date (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Default: completedMax=2031-01-01. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00

parameters.name: completedMin
parameters.description: Lower bound for a task's completion date (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Default: completedMin=1970-01-01. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00

parameters.name: dueMax
parameters.description: Upper bound for a task's due date (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Default: dueMax=2031-01-01. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00

parameters.name: dueMin
parameters.description: Lower bound for a task's due date (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Default: dueMin=1970-01-01. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00

parameters.name: showCompleted
parameters.description: Specify whether or not to show completed tasks. Default: showCompleted=true

parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Specify whether or not to show deleted tasks. Default: showDeleted=false

parameters.name: showHidden
parameters.description: Specify whether or not to show hidden tasks. Default: showHidden=true

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Token specifying the result page to return. The default is to return the first page.

parameters.name: updatedMin
parameters.description: Lower bound for a task's last modification time (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00Z. The default is not to filter by last modification time.

get.description: Returns all Task Resources in the specified task list. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Specify the task's parent task ID. No parameter indicates an insertion or a move to the top level of the task list.

parameters.name: previous
parameters.description: Specify the task's previous task ID. No parameter indicates an insertion or a move to the first position in the sublist.

post.description: Creates a new task on the specified task list. Returns a copy of the created Task Resource. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: tasklist
parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated user's default task list, use the special value @default.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: Task identifier.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

get.description: Returns the specified Task Resource. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

put.description: Updates the specified task. Returns a copy of the updated Task Resource. Authentication is required.

delete.description: Deletes the specified task from the task list. Returns no data (only a status code). Authentication is required.

parameters.name: tasklist
parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated user's default task list, use the special value @default.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: Task identifier.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Specify the task's parent task ID. No parameter indicates an insertion or a move to the top level of the task list.

parameters.name: previous
parameters.description: Specify the task's previous task ID. No parameter indicates an insertion or a move to the first position in the sublist.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

post.description: Moves the specified task to another position in the task list. This can include putting it as a child task under a new parent and/or moving it to a different position among its sibling tasks. Returns a copy of the updated Task Resource. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: tasklist
parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated user's default task list, use the special value @default.

post.description: Clears all completed tasks from the specified task list. The affected tasks are marked as hidden and are no longer returned by default when retrieving all tasks for a task list. Returns no data (only a status code). Authentication is required.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of elements to return with this request. Default: maxResults=20. Maximum allowable value: maxResults=100.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Token specifying the result page to return. The default is to return the first page.

get.description: Returns all the authenticated user's Tasklist Resources. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type.

post.description: Creates a new task list and adds it to the authenticated user's task lists. Returns a copy of the created Tasklist Resource. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: tasklist
parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated user's default task list, use the special value @default.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's specified Tasklist Resource. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's specified task list. Returns a copy of the updated Tasklist Resource. Authentication is required.

delete.description: Deletes the authenticated user's specified task list. Returns no data (only a status code). Authentication is required.
